domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Other countries don’t have mass deaths like we have.

Other countries don’t have economic devastation with 20%+ unemployment & no safety net. 

Other countries aren’t the worldwide epicenter for COVID19.

We are. And it’s a policy choice Trump has made.

Who’s in charge matters.
